de.jannlab.core

Class RecurrentNetBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.jannlab.core.NetBase
      • de.jannlab.core.RecurrentNetBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Net, Serializable, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BidirectionalNetBase, OfflineRecurrentNetBase, OnlineRecurrentNetBase

    public abstract class RecurrentNetBase
extends NetBase
    This is an abstract inter class for other recurrent network types. It contains copy methods to tranfer data between different timesteps.

    Author:
    Sebastian Otte
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
